product_name: Maui Jim Hot Sands Polarized Sunglasses - Men's
long_description: Inspired by a popular surf break in Lahaina, the Maui Jim Hot Sands polarized sunglasses shade your eyes with a sporty, edgy design and high performance optics to complement your active lifestyle. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Maui Jim PolarizedPlus(R)2 technology blocks glare and UV rays from all angles; manages harmful blue light and boosts colors for clarity and contrast. Root Beer frames feature HCL(R) Bronze lenses, ideal for variable conditions from sun to overcast. Gloss Black frames feature neutral grey lenses, ideal for bright, direct sunlight days. Grilamid nylon frames offer a consistent fit and flexibility at any temperature, and they are extremely light and impact resistant. Grippy, comfortable rubber nose pads prevent slippage. Glasses come with a protective case and cleaning cloth.
